abstract: This work was supported in part by The Netherlands Organization for Scientific research (NWO-VIDI; grant 91715359) and CSO/NRS Scottish Senior Clinical Fellowship award (SCAF/16/03). The study was co-sponsored by the Spaarne Hospital Haarlem and the UMC Utrecht, The Netherlands.
affiliations: Spaarne Hospital Haarlem and the UMC Utrecht, The Netherlands
author: Elisabeth A.M. Sanders; Debby Bogaert; Marlies A. van Houten; Emma M. de Koff
title: Symptomatology during seasonal coronavirus infections in children is associated with viral and bacterial co-detection

funding.funding-statement: This work was supported in part by The Netherlands Organization for Scientific research (NWO-VIDI; grant 91715359) and CSO/NRS Scottish Senior Clinical Fellowship award (SCAF/16/03)
